BANNER_TEXT_LINE_1.translation: Get alerts from Varsom sent to SMS or e-mail.

BANNER_TEXT_LINE_2.translation: Set up or manage your alerts here.

LINE_1.translation: Use the warnings, data and maps at your own risk. Errors and omissions may be present.

LINE_2.translation: A warning is a planning tool and may differ from the actual situation. Always make your own evaluation. Conditions may be complex and differ from the warning.

LINE_3.translation: Data on Regobs is produced by the users and is available «as is». It may contain errors and omissions. NVE makes no warranties for errors, omissions and assessments produced by the users.

TERMS.translation: Data on Varsom Regobs is produced by the users of Regobs and is available as it is. The information may contain errors and omissions. NVE makes no guarantee for the quality or accuracy of the information which is found on Regobs and does not take responsibility for data which is incorrect or misleading. The number of stars besides a username (1-5) indicates the level of competence of the person providing observations. Without stars, competence is unknown or low.

SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE.translation: Error while connecting to the service. Do you have mobile network? Please wait a few minutes and try again.

UNAUTHORIZED.translation: Wrong username or password. Please retry.

UNKNOWN_ERROR.translation: Error while logging in. Message from server:

ERROR_REPORT_DESCRIPTION.translation: Please describe your issue below. If you have screenshots please attach.

SHORT_LIST.translation: Jan, Feb, Mar, Apr, May, Jun, Jul, Aug, Sep, Oct, Nov, Des

NO_OBSERVATIONS_TEXT.translation: Your observartions will appear here. Share your observations, pictures and assessements with others on Varsom Regobs.

SENT_SUBTITLE.translation: The following observations have been submitted and are now stored in Regobs.

NO_OBSERVATIONS_TEXT.translation: There are no observations in the map section, try to change the view or expand the period you want to see observations from.

LOCATION_DENIED_MESSAGE.translation: Cannot show location in map without permission.

MESSAGE.translation:
Use observations at your own risk, produced by the users  and is available «as is».
NVE makes no warranties for errors, omissions and assessments produced by the users.
Consider the observations in light of the competence of the observer, as shown by stars next to the name.
Use the maps at your own risk and always make your own evaluation. The maps may contain errors and omissions.

CONFIRM_RESET.translation: Are you sure you want to reset all fields?

COMMENT_PLACEHOLDER.translation: Provide description of the danger sign

ON_THIS_SIDE_OF_THE_WATER.translation: On this side of the lake

DRAFTS_DESCRIPTION.translation: These observations are in progress and not submitted.

BODY.translation: Hi! I have problems sending this registration. Can you help me?

PROBLEM.translation: There has been a problem with your registration

PROBLEM_HELP_TEXT.translation: Observations with errors are stored in your phone and when the problem is resolved you will be able to resubmit.

SUBTITLE.translation: Missing network or submission took too long. We'll try again after a while and hope that the network has improved.

DESCRIPTION.translation: You can upload photos of the area you have observed or photos of other things you might find relevant.

ICE_HEIGHT_AFTER_NO.translation: Height from the surface to the water in the hole

IMAGE_DESCRIPTION_PLACEHOLDER.translation: Add a description to the image

COMMENT_PLACEHOLDER.translation: Why did it happen? Did it go well? Could the situation have been avoided?

INVALID_IMAGE.translation: Sorry, this is an invalid image

REQUIRED_FIELDS_MISSING.translation: Some fields are invalid. Do you want to reset form and go back?

MESSAGE.translation: You are about to leave the registration without submitting. Do you want to save as draft?

SAVED_DESCRIPTION.translation: These will be synchronized when you have network connection.

DATE_WARNING.translation: Date is different from observation time

FORECAST_CORRECT.translation: Assessment of avalanche forecast on varsom.no

INCIDENT_PLACEHOLDER.translation: Did the avalanche cause any damage, accidents or close calls? Why and how did it happen? Could the situation have been avoided?

TERRAIN_START_ZONE.translation: Terrain type in the release area

IS_PROFILE_TO_GROUND.translation: Is the profile dug to the ground?

SNOW_PROFILE_HELP_TEXT.translation: Unfortunately, we do not have a form for snow profiles in the current version of the Varsom Regobs app. But, you can upload a picture of a hand drawn profile or an export from a third party app like Ullr Labs Avalanche. On regobs.no you may update the profile information with the forms and plots provided there.

NO_PROFILES_FOUND.translation: No layers from other profiles found

OTHER_PROFILE_DESCRIPTION.translation: You can choose to copy the layers from a previously registered profile among the last 14 days within 100 km.

COMMENT_PLACEHOLDER.translation: How is the snow distribution generally in relation to elevation and aspect? Are there significant differences in the local region?

AIR_TEMPERATURE_PLACEHOLDER.translation: Can be given with two decimals

COMMENT_PLACEHOLDER.translation: How has the weather been over the last 24 hours? Example: Has there been snowfall? Have there been temperature changes? At what altitude has the freezing point been?

CAN_YOU_SEE_WATER.translation: Has the water left it’s course?

DESCRIBE_SITUATION.translation: How would you describe the situation?

HOW_DO_YOU_READ.translation: How do you read the water level?

MARKED_WITH.translation: I have marked the water level with

MARKING_REFERENCE.translation: I have marked water level on

ERROR.translation: Couldn't save nickname. Please try later.

HELP_TEXT.translation: You need a nickname to use Varsom Regobs. The nickname is shown on your observations.

ALLOW_ANALYTICS_DESCRIPTION.translation: Help us improve Varsom Regobs by letting us know how you use the application.

ALLOW_ANALYTICS_DESCRIPTION_LINE2.translation: This data is anonymous and cannot be linked to you personally.

CONFIRM_RESET.translation: Are you sure you want to reset app?

DROPDOWNS_FAILED.translation: Could not update dropdowns. Please check network settings and try again later.

READ_MORE_IN_LICENSE_AGREEMENT.translation: You can read about our use of data in our privacy policy.

SIZE_OF_TILES_CACHE.translation: Size of tiles saved on device

TILES_CACHE_SIZE.translation: Number of tiles saved on device

NO_NORWAY.translation: No, in other countries as well

SUBTITLE.translation: Will you use the app only in Norway?

LINE_1.translation: Use the information in the app, but also make your own judgments. View the observations in context of the observer's competence that appears as stars by the name.
View observations and warnings when you plan your trip.
See where you are in relation to danger zones in the terrain. Use support maps adapted to the dangers you are looking for.

HEADER.translation: Share what you have seen with others!

LINE_1.translation: Share your observations and photos with others.
Choose what to see and share on Regobs. You can read about sharing observations at varsom.no/snøskredskolen and varsom.no/isskolen

ICE_MAP_DESCRIPTION.translation: The support map shows parts of watercourses that behave unpredictably throughout the winter due to regulations for power generation

INFO_PAGE.translation:
About maps with slope angle and runout zones

The maps are automatically produced and may contain errors. There may be steep terrain, which is not represented in the elevation model and thus not displayed in the maps. Some avalanches may have longer runouts than what is displayed as runout zones in the maps.

What consideration to take?

Adjust your risk by choosing where, when and how you travel. Varsom Regobs is a planning tool and its data may differ from the actual situation. Always make your own evaluation.  

When is it safe?

All travel in snow covered avalanche terrain has an element of risk.

Want to learn more?

You may learn more by taking an avalanche safety course and on Snøskredskolen on Varsom.no.

STEEPNESS_COLOR_INFO.translation: Colors indicate the slope angle of the terrain

STEEPNESS_MAP_DISCLAMER.translation: For trip planning only. The map is automatically produced and may have errors and omissions, e.g. steep terrain not displayed.

STEEPNESS_OUTLET_LEGEND_TEXT_1.translation: Short runouts (50% of the avalanches reach farther)

STEEPNESS_OUTLET_LEGEND_TEXT_2.translation: Medium runouts (25% of the avalanches reach farther)

STEEPNESS_OUTLET_LEGEND_TEXT_3.translation:
Long runouts (5% of the avalanches reach farther)
Some avalanches may have longer runouts than displayed as runout zones in the map.

STEEPNESS_OUTLET_MAP_DESCRIPTION.translation: Slope angle shading map with runout zones

STEEPNESS_OUTLET_MAP_DISCLAMER.translation:
For trip planning only. The map is automatically produced and may have errors and omissions, e.g. steep terrain or runouts not displayed.

Colours give runout zones for avalanches:

COMMENT_DESCRIPTION.translation: Describe what kind of trip you are going and what you are looking for, etc.

END_ERROR.translation: Could not stop trip. Please try again later. The trip will stop automatically by midnight.

ERROR.translation: Error while starting trip. Please try again.

ERROR_POSITION.translation: Cannot start trip without GPS position.

LEGACY_HELP_TEXT.translation:
You can use this form to report that you are planning a trip today.

It is useful for the forecaster team to know if observations can be expected today. It is also useful to know what kind of observations can be expected (what are you looking for, where are you going on a trip) and when do you expect these to be submitted to Regobs.

All paid observers must record what types of obs-tour are being planned: is it an ordinary paid observation trip, or is this an additional registration? Additional registration is the submission of observations you have made during other work or in your spare time.

B_REGIONS_SUBTITLE.translation: Warnings only for danger level 4 and 5

NO_FAVOURITES_TEXT.translation: Swipe the alert you want to favorite and it will appear here.

NO_WARNINGS_TEXT.translation: There is no warnings for the area you are in. When there is any, they will appear here.
